title: How to Wash Damask

steps.headline: Fill a large basin or bathtub with cool water.
steps.description: Add a mild detergent that lacks optical brightener or bleach.

steps.headline: Wash gently by hand.
steps.description: Avoid any rigorous rubbing or scrubbing.

steps.headline: Allow to dry.
steps.description: Either line dry or use a dryer. Only dry until damp. If line drying, make it taut, to ensure that it dries without wrinkles.

steps.headline: Iron damp damask dry.
steps.description: This will ensure easier ironing and a wrinkle-free finish. There must be a press cloth between the iron and the damask fabric. This protects the fabric from scorching. Iron dark damask inside out, to prevent adding shininess to the front.

steps.headline: Check the tag for any recommended temperature.
Treat stains directly with stain remover.
steps.description: Do not leave the damask to soak. If using a bleaching agent, only use one with hydrogen peroxide. This will release the stain without harming the fibers.

steps.headline: Place in the washing machine with a mild detergent.
steps.description: Do not overfill the machine; remove other items if it feels too full.

steps.headline: Allow to dry.
steps.description: Either line dry or use a dryer. Only dry until damp. If line drying, make it taut, to ensure that it dries without wrinkles.

steps.headline: Iron damp damask dry.
steps.description: This will ensure easier ironing and a wrinkle-free finish. There must be a press cloth between the iron and the damask fabric. This protects the fabric from scorching. Iron dark damask inside out, to prevent adding shininess to the front.

steps.headline: Scrape the wax off the damask fabric.
steps.description: Use a blunt butter knife, plastic knife or similar.

steps.headline: Cover the wax stain with paper towels.
Iron over the stain with a warm iron.
steps.description: The wax in the cloth will transfer onto the paper towel.

steps.headline: Remove the paper towel and inspect the stain.
steps.description: If it's still there, add new towel and repeat.

steps.headline: When you're happy that the wax has been removed, wash and dry as outlined above.
